title: Track Quiz Events for Cookied Users
description:
This script takes data from a webpage survey form that stores answers in Local Storage in the browser, then pushes the following to Klaviyo:
  1. Started Quiz Event
  2. Profile properties of the answers that the user selected
  3. Finished Quiz Event.
This allows folks to run abandoned quiz flows in Klaviyo and segment profiles by their answers to the quiz. This should be pasted just before the closing body tag in the browser
